title: Vegetable Strudel
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '200g quark, Greek yoghurt or creme fraiche', '200g plain flour', '200g butter', 'salt', 'paprika', 'For the filling', 'oil or butter', '100g onions, finely diced', '250g mushrooms, cut into thin slices', '250g cabbage, shredded', '250g carrots, grated', '100g peas', 'black pepper', 'basil', '1 egg white', '1 egg yolk', '100g grated cheese']
